title: Grand Portage National Monument: Kids & Youth
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        Junior Rangers ready to go! NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen       Visiting Grand Portage National Monument this summer?  Become a Junior Ranger.  In 2010, 432 young people became Grand Portage Junior Rangers (Up from 345 in 2009).  A new and improved Junior Ranger Booklet is being tested at Grand Portage.  We welcome you to come and help test it out!        The Junior Ranger program at Grand Portage National Monument is a familiy activity NPS Photo / Mike Plummer-Steen
